snippet.title: Scribblenauts Unlimited - Trailer (Wii U & Nintendo 3DS)
snippet.description:
Official Store: http://ow.ly/r3gHA
Scribblenauts Unlimited is released on Wii U and Nintendo 3DS on the 6th of December 2013.

Official Site: http://www.nintendo.co.uk/Misc-/Scribblenauts/Scribblenauts-Unlimited-702235.html
Wii U on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WiiU.co.uk
Nintendo 3DS on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Nintendo3DSUK
Nintendo UK on Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/NintendoUK
